xwikidoc.title: SirGlarHalath
xwikidoc.content: Sir Glar Halath is the Seneschal of the AirKnights of Pazuzu. (% style="color:#ff0000;" %)Note: Glar Halath was killed at SuriNatha by the adventuring party of Osrik, Alecsa, Gloriana, Cinoi, and Evie.
